name: GE Vernova Inc.
summary: GE Vernova Inc. is a publicly traded energy technology company formed in 2024 as a spin-off from General Electric’s energy businesses. Headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, GE Vernova focuses on power generation, renewable energy, and electrification, and operates globally with nearly 77,000 employees. The company is a major player in the energy sector, helping to electrify and decarbonize the world’s power systems.
